resources.string: What I can do for the company
I build scalable and maintainable Applications. My ability to take note of the tinest detail ensures any App I create are bug free.
Android developer with a background in Electrical Engineering. Skilled in Kotlin and Java for developing applications that follow modern Android Architecture.

Asteroid app that shows the asteroids detected by NASA that passes near earth. It uses the NASA API to fetch the data. Each asteroid is displayed on a RecyclerView. On clicking, it shows more details. The asteroid data are cached locally.
: MVVM Architecture, Kotlin, Retrofit, RecyclerView, ViewModel, DataBinding, Coil image loader, Room, LiveData, WorkManager, Android Navigation Component, Coroutine, Moshi
Participant of the scholarship program organized by Google, Andela and Pluralsight to support software developers in Africa on Android, Google Cloud and Mobile Web development.
- Mastered in-demand Android skills such as testing, Android Architecture components, Coroutine
- Accessed Pluralsight courses focused on Android development
